name: Odbudov-Obudov
description:
The game was created as an entry in #ZostanWDomuRobGry game jam organized by Fundacja Indie Games Polska in April 2020. The theme was a polish word "Odbudowa" - which can mean many things, but mainly is about reconstruction and restoration. 

It's a short puzzle game that might strain your memory a little, and will probably require some fast movement, as it's real-time. Your objective is to restore a factory to it's former glory and get some money out of it. 

Observe MachinesUse Wooden TablesReplace Broken Things

Controls:

WSAD - movement
E - interact
H - tooltips
Mouse - UI interaction, machine ordering, etc.

Authors:
We like to call ourself and some of our friends "belief-rd", we're software developers from that team. (it's not official or anything)
- Mikolaj "Bajter" Korcz
- Marcin "Gohan" Hulist

All the graphic assets we used are either CC0 (thanks Kenney!), or self authored. 

All the sounds come from GameDev Market Pro Sound Collection. 

Please enjoy!
